title: XDM Consent
description: An XDM Consent is a representation of the consent responses given by end users/consumers of a given brand to allow or not allow the Brand/Customers to use their personal data for analytics purposes like Direct Marketing, First Party personalization, cross device profile consolidation, advertsing, sending offers etc..

xdm:id.title: Id
xdm:id.description: The unique identifier of the identity associated with this record.

xdm:ttl.title: Time to Live
xdm:ttl.description: The date and time this entry is valid until.

xdm:consentTimestamp.title: Consent Timestamp
xdm:consentTimestamp.description: The date and time the snapshot of consent assertions was taken.

xdm:consentSignal.title: Consent Signal
xdm:consentSignal.description: User consent signal for a purpose within a given consent stack.
